member.summary: Adds a new URL segment.

The value of the segment.

member.summary: Builds the URL.

member.summary: The phone number to which the code was sent.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.PasswordlessSmsResponse.RequestLanguage
member.summary: The language is which the message was sent.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenDelegationRequest.RefreshToken
member.summary: The current RefreshToken to update.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to get a new token, based on a previously issued refresh token.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenRequest.RefreshToken
member.summary: A valid refresh token previously issued to the client.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenRequest.Scope
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional scope for the access request.
member.remarks: The requested scope must not include any scope not originally granted by the resource owner, and if omitted is trated as equal to the scope originally granted by the resource owner.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenRequest.ClientId
member.summary: The client id for which the refresh token was issued.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.RefreshTokenRequest.ClientSecret
member.summary: The secret of the client for which the refresh token was issued.

member.summary: Base class for all authentication tokens.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.TokenBase.TokenType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the token.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UnlinkUserRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to unlink a secondary user account from a primary user account.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UnlinkUserRequest.Token
member.summary: The access token for the primary user account

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UnlinkUserRequest.UserId
member.summary: The ID of the secondary user account.
member.remarks: Should be in the format provider|id

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo
member.summary: Represents the information of a user as available from a standard OIDC /userinfo endpoint. http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#StandardClaims

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.UserId
member.summary: The Subject-Identifier for the user at the issuer. It's a unique value to identify the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.FullName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's full name in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the user's locale and preferences.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the given name(s) or first name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple given names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the surname(s) or last name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple family names or no family name; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.MiddleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the middle name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple middle names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters. Also note that in some cultures, middle names are not used.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.NickName
member.summary: Gets or sets a casual name of the user that may or may not be the same as the given_name. For instance, a nickname value of 'Mike' might be returned alongside a given_name value of 'Michael'.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PreferredUsername
member.summary: Gets or sets the shorthand name by which the user wishes to be referred to at the RP, such as janedoe or j.doe. This value MAY be any valid JSON string including special characters such as @, /, or whitespace. The RP MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Profile
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the user's profile page. The contents of this Web page SHOULD be about the End-User.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Picture
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the user's profile picture. This URL MUST refer to an image file (for example, a PNG, JPEG, or GIF image file), rather than to a Web page containing an image.
member.remarks: Note that this URL SHOULD specifically reference a profile photo of the End-User suitable for displaying when describing the user, rather than an arbitrary photo taken by the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Website
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the user's Web page or blog. This Web page SHOULD contain information published by the End-User or an organization that the End-User is affiliated with.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's preferred e-mail address.
member.remarks: The RP MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.EmailVerified
member.summary: True if the user's e-mail address has been verified; otherwise false.
member.remarks: When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this e-mail address was controlled by the user at the time the verification was performed. The means by which an e-mail address is verified is context-specific, and dependent upon the trust framework or contractual agreements within which the parties are operating.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Gender
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's gender. Values defined by this specification are female and male. Other values MAY be used when neither of the defined values are applicable.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Birthdate
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's birthday, represented as an ISO 8601:2004 [ISO86012004] YYYY-MM-DD format. The year MAY be 0000, indicating that it is omitted. To represent only the year, YYYY format is allowed.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.ZoneInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string from zoneinfo [http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#zoneinfo] time zone database representing the End-User's time zone. For example, Europe/Paris or America/Los_Angeles.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Locale
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's locale, represented as a BCP47 [RFC5646] language tag. This is typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 [ISO6391] language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 [ISO31661] country code in uppercase, separated by a dash. For example, en-US or fr-CA.
member.remarks: As a compatibility note, some implementations have used an underscore as the separator rather than a dash, for example, en_US; Relying Parties MAY choose to accept this locale syntax as well.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's preferred telephone number. E.164 [E.164] is RECOMMENDED as the format of this Claim, for example, +1 (425) 555-1212 or +56 (2) 687 2400. If the phone number contains an extension, it is RECOMMENDED that the extension be represented using the RFC 3966 [RFC3966] extension syntax, for example, +1 (604) 555-1234;ext=5678.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PhoneNumberVerified
member.summary: True if the End-User's phone number has been verified; otherwise false. When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this phone number was controlled by the user at the time the verification was performed. The means by which a phone number is verified is context-specific, and dependent upon the trust framework or contractual agreements within which the parties are operating. When true, the phone_number Claim MUST be in E.164 format and any extensions MUST be represented in RFC 3966 format.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Address
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's preferred postal address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the user's information was last updated. Its value is a JSON number representing the number of seconds from 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z as measured in UTC until the date/time.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.AdditionalClaims
member.summary: Gets or sets additional claims about the user that are not represented by properties of the UserInfo class.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress
member.summary: Represents a physical mailing address of an user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Formatted
member.summary: Gets or sets the full mailing address, formatted for display or use on a mailing label.
member.remarks: This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n").

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the full street address component, which MAY include house number, street name, Post Office Box, and multi-line extended street address information.
member.remarks: This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n").

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Locality
member.summary: Gets or sets the city or locality component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the state, province, prefecture, or region component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the zip code or postal code component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Country
member.summary: Gets or sets the country component of the address.

member.summary: Gets or sets the client (app) identifier.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user's password.
